name: Association for weaker section affairs and Rural Development
briefDescription: 1. Vision: To  strive to help people particularly the poor and downtrodden to get minimum needs, social justice and overall equality. AWARD  is out come of a dream, a concept and ideology  of dedicated  executive committee members  to dedicate themselves to serve the mankind especially those who  are oppressed, deprived and have been subjected to untold problems and sufferings in rural   and   urban areas due to acute poverty, harassment and exploitation by the rich and affluent sections of the society. As a result of the exploitation, poor people are not able to develop and lead the life of equals in the society. In the backdrop of this, The AWARD decided to work for elevation of the such vulnerable sections of the society especially Da
